short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to replace the X logo on twitter.com/x.com with any text you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to replace the X logo on twitter.com/x.com with any text you want.

I saw a tweet of a user opening Inspect Element and changing the X logo on Twitter to text. I have no idea where the tweet went, but it inspired me to make this extension!
